entries.text:
By 2015, I had been gluing my pieces to the toilet walls of my favorite galleries for about 3 years. Without any feedback whatsoever. I had no idea if anybody else took notice of the little world I was creating for myself.

Then Feinkunst Kr체ger announced on social media that they are interested in featuring one of my pieces in the tenth anniversary of their yearly group show, "Don't Wake Daddy".

That inspired me to make this large piece. It's about 1m in size and made from the flyers of the previous 9 Don't Wake Daddy Shows. Featuring Mia M채kil채, Moki, Van Arno, Brendan Danielsson, Marcus Sch채fer, Christian Rex van Minnen and Fred Stonehouse.
